rukus.text: 56|75|Savgand ʙa cojgohi sitoragon
56|76|Ki agar ʙidoned, savgandi ʙuzurge ast
56|77|Ki in [guftor] Qur'one garonqadr ast
56|78|Dar lavhi mahfuz qaror dorad
56|79|Cuz faristagoni poksirat kase [onro nameʙinad] ʙa on dastrasi nadorad
56|80|Az suji Parvardigori cahonijon nozil sudaast
56|81|Ojo in suxanro saʙuk mesumored
56|82|Va ʙa coji sukri ruzihoe, ki ʙa sumo doda sudaast, onro duruƣ mepindored
56|83|On goh ki [coni nazdikonaton] ʙa gulugoh merasad
56|84|Va sumo dar on hangom nazzora mekuned
56|85|Va Mo az sumo ʙa u nazdiktarem, vale nameʙined
56|86|Agar rost megued va hargiz dar ʙaroʙari a'molaton cazo doda namesaved [va qijomate nest]
56|87|pas, caro conasro ʙoznamegardoned
56|88|Ammo agar u dar zumrai muqarraʙon ʙosad
56|89|Dar oromisu kusois va ʙihisti purne'mat ast
56|90|Va agar dar zumrai saodatmandon ʙosad
56|91|[ʙa u gufta mesavad] «Salomat va amnijat ʙar tu ʙod, ki az saodatmandon hasti»
56|92|Ammo agar az takziʙkunandagoni gumroh [va dar zumrai tiraʙaxton] ʙosad
56|93|ʙo oʙi cuson [az u] paziroi mesavad
56|94|va ʙa [otasi] duzax darmeojad
56|95|In [va'dai podos va azoʙ] jaqinan haqiqat dorad [va tardide dar on nest]
56|96|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] ʙo [zikri] nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgat [uro] tasʙeh guj
